about_the_game:
Welcome to the revolutionary world of Unity programming education with 'U-Sharp.' U-Sharp is the first-of-its-kind game designed to make learning Unity and C-Sharp fun and engaging.

Overview:

U-Sharp offers a unique blend of education and entertainment. Explore a virtual universe where your character must retrieve encrypted files from a hacked computer. Your mission: to modify code to solve themed challenges that range from the fundamental basics to advanced expertise.


Key Features:

  • Master Unity and C-Sharp programming through hands-on, interactive gameplay.
  • Engage with captivating puzzles that promote problem-solving, logical thinking, and creativity.
  • A guided learning path ensures a smooth, barrier-free experience.
  • Mistakes are not failures; they are stepping stones to progress, thanks to clear feedback and enjoyable outcomes.

Be part of the Community:

Join the Discord Server for updates and exchange with other learners and challenge seekers.

Whether you're new to programming or looking to enhance your Unity skills, U-Sharp offers an inclusive, entertaining, and unique learning adventure. Dive into this virtual world and emerge as a Unity programming expert. Learning has never been this exciting!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: The world's first Unity programming learning game with C-Sharp. Explore, solve, and modify code in themed challenges from basics to expert levels. Dive into a one-of-a-kind learning adventure, mastering Unity along the way.
